verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un] [V: signed] [ARG1: a joint statement that called for better relations , peace on the Korean peninsula and denuclearization]
President Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un signed [ARG0: a joint statement] [R-ARG0: that] [V: called] [ARG1: for better relations , peace on the Korean peninsula and denuclearization]
